entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 p.m. EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.summary: Rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
